articles.author: Kim Mackrael, Sarah E. Needleman
articles.title: EU Approves Microsoft's $75 Billion Activision Blizzard Deal - WSJ - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: European Union decision comes after rejection from U.K. regulator threatened the deal’s prospects

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft's Activision Blizzard acquisition approved by EU regulators - The Verge
articles.description: Regulators in Europe have cleared the way for Microsoft’s Activision Blizzard acquisition. After concerns over Call of Duty and cloud competition, the European Commission has approved the deal.
